attributes.action: End the sanctions in Syria so countries are able to send humanitarian aid now!
attributes.additional_details: This is not the time for politics or muscles to dictate the inbound flow of aid to support the recent earthquake and destruction. UK and America have sanctions currently on Syria preventing inflow of humanitarian aid. Please sign up and support this petition to ensure immediate freezing or removal of the sanctions in Syria.
attributes.background: End the sanctions in Syria so countries are able to send humanitarian aid immediately! This is not the time for politics or muscles to dictate the inbound flow of aid to support the recent earthquake and destruction.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with the creator of the petition to talk about it, but we didn't hear back.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Lift all sanctions on Syria after the devastating Earthquake: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632889
